page_content:
Layer 1
•Input: colored image of size 100 x 100 x 3 (the colors channel Red, Green and 
Blue)
◦ K = 200
◦ F = 3
◦ P = 0
◦ S = 1
•O = (W−F+2P)/S+1 = (100 –3 + 0)/1 + 1= 98
•Output volume size = 98 x 98 x 200
•No. of parameter = F⋅F⋅D1 = 3 x 3 x 3 = 27 for each filter
•Total No. of Parameter = (F⋅F⋅D1)⋅K + K  = 27 X 200 + 200 = 5600
